column4: man, I can't believe I've been at this for 7 hours now, I should have just listened to you guys and wiped/reinstalled the machine. Who knew a microphone would be so hard to get working!!!
anybody know a trick for resuming a CD download, BTW?  My last attempt stopped with 12 seconds remaining
I'm just trying to remove the flash player so that my package database is in a consistent state and I can dist-upgrade
